name: Elderglade
description: Elderglade is a next-generation Web3 fantasy gaming experience, combined of currently live mobile game and expanding into a MMORPG extraction looter, successfully bridging the gap between Web2 & Web3 gaming. Its core mission is to deliver fun, accessible, and immersive gameplay â€”starting with a real-time PvP match-3 mobile game (available on LINE, Telegram, native apps and Web) and expanding into a full AI-driven, retro-style MMORPG with turn-based PvPvE extraction looter mechanics. Elderglade leverages blockchain technology for asset ownership, seamless player onboarding, AI technology integration and a deflationary $ELDE token fuelling its first-of-a-kind hybrid in-game economy and ecosystem. Currently, Elderglade has over 11 million users across all platforms, generates consistent on-chain revenue, and is preparing for its upcoming full game launch.
